title: 289 - The 5 Dynamic Steps to Finding Your Creative Sensibility
description:
..........................................................................

Take Our New Skillshare Class - Find Your Style: 5 Exercises for Unlocking Your Creative Identity
https://skl.sh/findyourstyle

............................................................................

BIG THANKS TO PATRONS FOR THEIR TESTIMONIALS!!
- Taylor Lee Nicholson - https://taylorleenicholson.com/
- Morgan Summers - https://www.instagram.com/uhbeautifulmes/
- Marco Bernard - https://mastermindsconnect.com/

ALSO! BIG Thanks to Obreanna McReynolds from Skillshare for Contributing!
https://www.obreanna.com/

............................................................................

SPONSORS

PATREON
If you’re a podcaster, Youtuber, musician, writer, illustrator... if you’re a creative person of any kind, or simply love one, now is the time to check out patreon.com. Now is the time to join the millions of fans and creators who are changing the way art is valued together.

STORYBLOCKS
This episode is brought to you by Storyblocks Video. Story Blocks give you studio-quality 4k stock video without blowing your budget. If you need b-roll, after effects templates, or video motion background you gotta check out Storyblocks Video. Head to storyblocks.com/CreativePepTalk to learn more about Storyblocks Video today.

SKILLSHARE X CREATIVE PEP TALK
Our first ever online video course is out now on SKILLSHARE!

Are you looking for your next big break? Whether you’ve NEVER had a big break in your creative career OR you’re a veteran creative who needs a new big break to reinvent yourself: this class is for you!!! Go to https://skl.sh/findyourstyle to get started!!!
author: andy@andy-j-miller.com (Jordan Aaron, Andy J. Pizza, Obreanna McReynolds, Ryan Appleton, Taylor Lee Nichols, Morgan Summers, Yoni Wolf, Marco Bernard)

itunes:title: 289 - The 5 Dynamic Steps to Finding Your Creative Sensibility
itunes:author: Jordan Aaron, Andy J. Pizza, Obreanna McReynolds, Ryan Appleton, Taylor Lee Nichols, Morgan Summers, Yoni Wolf, Marco Bernard
itunes:summary:
Do you ever feel like you’re wandering on a weird side road in your creative journey, miles away from where your true potential lies? It’s so easy to get lost and distracted down some random rabbit hole and completely get yourself off course.

In this episode we dive into how to get back to the pulse of your true sensibility and to the work that really matters to you. If you are struggling to keep motivated during these times and want to find how to relight your creative pilot light brighter than ever - do not miss this episode!

THE DAY HAS COME! We JUST DROPPED our 2nd ever SKILLSHARE CLASS!! This episode is a celebration of that and acts as complementary / supplementary content to the class. We have never been so excited to share a project with you, this class contains all the heart and soul of the podcast and you are going to love it!! Sign up here: https://skl.sh/findyourstyle
